languages.text: Отрывки "Уложения о наказаниях", зачитанные корабельным исповедником по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системе, произвели деморализующее воздействие на экипаж и вызвали попытку массового дезертирства сразу после завершения варп-прыжка. Диверсия была предотвращена, зафиксированы обширные повреждения в отсеках спасательных челноков.

traits.locale_text: Отрывки "Уложения о наказаниях", зачитанные Корабельным исповедником по вокс-системе, произвели деморализующее воздействие на экипаж и вызвали попытку массового дезертирства сразу после завершения варп-прыжка. Диверсия была предотвращена, зафиксированы обширные повреждения в отсеках спасательных челноков.

languages.text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.
languages.original_text: Отрывки "Уложения о наказаниях", зачитанные корабельным исповедником по {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}-системе, произвели деморализующее воздействие на экипаж и вызвали попытку массового дезертирства сразу после завершения варп-прыжка. Диверсия была предотвращена, зафиксированы обширные повреждения в отсеках спасательных челноков.

traits.locale_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the vox-system, had a demoralizing effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the vox-system, had a demoralizing effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the vox-system, had a demoralizing effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

languages.text: Los extractos del Código de Castigo que el confesor de la nave leyó por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} tuvieron un efecto desmoralizador en la tripulación que provocó un intento de deserción masiva al terminar el salto de disformidad. Se consiguió detener la acción subversiva, pero se registraron daños extensos en las bahías de lanzaderas de escape.
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

traits.locale_text: Los extractos del Código de Castigo que el confesor de la nave leyó por el sistema de {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} tuvieron un efecto desmoralizador en la tripulación que provocó un intento de deserción masiva al terminar el salto de disformidad. Se consiguió detener la acción subversiva, pero se registraron daños extensos en las bahías de lanzaderas de escape.

languages.text: 舰上的告解者通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统宣读了《惩戒法典》的摘要内容，但却反而打击了船员们的士气。亚空间跳跃结束之后，船员立刻爆发了大规模的逃亡企图。尽管哗变得到了阻止，但逃生用的穿梭机机库内遭到了严重破坏。
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

traits.locale_text: 舰上的司祭通过{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统宣读了《惩戒法典》的摘要内容，但却反而打击了船员们的士气。亚空间跳跃结束之后，船员立刻爆发了大规模的逃亡企图。尽管哗变得到了阻止，但逃生用的穿梭机机库内遭到了严重破坏。

languages.text: 船の聴罪師が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムを通じて詠み上げた罰の掟によって、クルーの士気が低下し、ワープジャンプが終わるとすぐに集団脱走未遂を引き起こした。この反乱行為は防がれたものの、脱出用シャトルベイに広範囲の被害が記録された。
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

traits.locale_text: 船の聴罪師が{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}システムを通じて詠み上げた罰の掟によって、クルーの士気が低下し、ワープジャンプが終わるとすぐに集団脱走未遂を引き起こした。この反乱行為は防がれたものの、脱出用シャトルベイに広範囲の被害が記録された。

languages.text: Auszüge aus dem Strafkodex, die vom Beichtvater des Schiffes über das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-System verlesen wurden, hatten eine demoralisierende Wirkung auf die Besatzung und provozierten einen massenhaften Desertionsversuch unmittelbar nach Abschluss des Warpsprungs. Die subversive Aktion konnte verhindert werden, und in den Shuttle-Räumen wurden große Schäden festgestellt.
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

languages.text: Les extraits du Code des Châtiments lus par le confesseur du vaisseau sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g} ont eu un effet dévastateur sur l'équipage, et une tentative de désertion massive s'est produite immédiatement après le saut Warp. Cet acte de subversion a été circonscrit, même si des pertes importantes ont été consignées au niveau de la baie des navettes d'évacuation.
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

traits.locale_text: Les extraits du Code des Châtiments lus par le confesseur du vaisseau sur le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}système-vox{/g} ont eu un effet dévastateur sur l'équipage, et une tentative de désertion massive s'est produite immédiatement après le saut Warp. Cet acte de subversion a été circonscrit, même si des pertes importantes ont été consignées au niveau de la baie des navettes d'évacuation.

languages.text: Geminin günah çıkarıcısının {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminde Ceza Kanunları'ndan alıntılar okuması, mürettebatta moral düşürücü bir etki yarattı ve öte sıçrama tamamlanır tamamlanmaz toplu bir firar girişimine önayak oldu. Tahrip edici eylemlerin önüne geçildi, kaçış mekiği bölmelerinde geniş çaplı hasar tespit edildi.
languages.original_text: Extracts from the Code of Punishment, which were read by the ship's confessor over the {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}-system, had a demoralising effect on the crew and provoked a mass desertion attempt immediately after the completion of the warp jump. The subversive action was prevented and widespread damage was logged in the escape shuttle bays.

traits.locale_text: Geminin günah çıkarıcısının {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g} sisteminde Ceza Kanunları'ndan alıntılar okuması, mürettebatta moral düşürücü bir etki yarattı ve öte sıçrama tamamlanır tamamlanmaz toplu bir firar girişimine önayak oldu. Tahrip edici eylemlerin önüne geçildi, kaçış mekiği bölümlerinde geniş çaplı hasar tespit edildi.
